Package g54889.humbug.model

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
g54889.humbug.model.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bumbelbee, Butterfly, Grasshopper, Ladybird, Snail, Spider
public abstract class Animal
extends Object
specifies that a typical value will appear in the JSON file. and that this value is the name of the class
